timeline.message: Fix IDE debug JVM flag for 1.16.2
Fix running; forgot to push this
Fix test, add strider mob goal and fix piglin goals

Updated Upstream (Bukkit/CraftBukkit)

Upstream has released updates that appears to apply and compile correctly.
This update has not been tested by PaperMC and as with ANY update, please do your own testing

eaf0bace Increase outdated build delay

2e178b09 #730: Let World#setSpawnLocation() support an angle
fad5fb9e SPIGOT-6086: Twisting vines growing at top of world crashes server

Fix MC-99259 Wither Boss Bar doesn't update until invulnerability period is over (#4164)

This fix was as simple as suggested by the code review on the issue at Mojira https://bugs.mojang.com/browse/MC-99259

I simply moved the call outside of the if/else block so it is called whether the Wither is invulnerable or not

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/master' into progress/1.16.2

* origin/master:
  [CI-SKIP] Create CODEOWNERS
update checkout-pr to latest I use
Fix MC-197883 by specifying the typeKey

Updated Upstream (CraftBukkit)

Upstream has released updates that appears to apply and compile correctly.
This update has not been tested by PaperMC and as with ANY update, please do your own testing

CraftBukkit Changes:
fe4efd19 SPIGOT-6093: Can't change ItemStack in EntityPickupItemEvent

Merge branch 'master' into progress/1.16.2

* master:
  Do not let the server load chunks from newer versions (1.16.2+)

MC-197883: Bandaid decode issue

Mojang has a mix of type and name in the data sets, but you can only
use one.

This will retry as name if type is asked for and not found.

[CI-SKIP] Update issue templates with notices

Add comment about our support to older versions and forks of Paper.

Don't require FACING data

Fixes PaperMC/Paper#3084.

Fix SpawnChangeEvent not firing for all use-cases

Fixes PaperMC/Paper#1913.

timeline.bodyText: maxPlayers missing in @param (makes Jenkins fail builds when creating Javadocs)
timeline.author: BillyGalbreath
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: Mariell Hoversholm <proximyst@proximyst.com>
+Date: Sat, 22 Aug 2020 23:59:25 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] Add #setMaxPlayers API
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
+index 62cc1c74c11f56dcbd1e24e9c5478497742e6351..7fd92462189be35808af67be1740345f186ce555 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
+@@ -171,6 +171,17 @@ public final class Bukkit {
+         return server.getMaxPlayers();
+     }
+ 
++    // Paper start
++    /**
++     * Set the maximum amount of players which can login to this server.
++     *
++     * @param the amount of players this server allows

replies.bodyText: I almost did it right! Easy fix though, feel free to PR, or I'll do it once I'm available tomorrow.
replies.author: Proximyst

timeline.bodyText: maxPlayers missing in @param (makes Jenkins fail builds when creating Javadocs)
timeline.author: BillyGalbreath
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+From 0000000000000000000000000000000000000000 Mon Sep 17 00:00:00 2001
+From: Mariell Hoversholm <proximyst@proximyst.com>
+Date: Sat, 22 Aug 2020 23:59:25 +0200
+Subject: [PATCH] Add #setMaxPlayers API
+
+
+diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
+index 62cc1c74c11f56dcbd1e24e9c5478497742e6351..7fd92462189be35808af67be1740345f186ce555 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Bukkit.java
+@@ -171,6 +171,17 @@ public final class Bukkit {
+         return server.getMaxPlayers();
+     }
+ 
++    // Paper start
++    /**
++     * Set the maximum amount of players which can login to this server.
++     *
++     * @param the amount of players this server allows
++     */
++    public static void setMaxPlayers(int maxPlayers) {
++        server.setMaxPlayers(maxPlayers);
++    }
++    // Paper end
++
+     /**
+      * Get the game port that the server runs on.
+      *
+diff --git a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Server.java b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Server.java
+index 6e01bf2d52e8bb6de7395f50c12f16c64aef72ae..bacb3ee9abe5fe26e02caa7f54fc4e6d5dd605fe 100644
+--- a/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Server.java
++++ b/src/main/java/org/bukkit/Server.java
+@@ -144,6 +144,15 @@ public interface Server extends PluginMessageRecipient {
+      */
+     public int getMaxPlayers();
+ 
++    // Paper start
++    /**
++     * Set the maximum amount of players which can login to this server.
++     *
++     * @param the amount of players this server allows

reshove this patch in manually and pray
